raw_text: This is the same sort of preference that is addressed by property-sharing constraint (Kameyama, 1986)

citing_paper_authors: Toru, Hirano | Yoshihiro, Matsuo | Genichiro, Kikui
raw_text: In this paper, we use centering theory (Kameyama, 1986) to determine how easily a noun phrase can be referred to in the following context

raw_text: There are two versions of the centering theory that have been applied to Japanese zero pronoun resolution: Kameyama ' s (Kameyama, 1986) and Walker ' s (Walker et al, 1994)
clean_text: There are two versions of the centering theory that have been applied to Japanese zero pronoun resolution: Kameyama's (Kameyama, 1986) and Walker's (Walker et al, 1994).
